forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 4pm. Mostly sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle veil of drizzle whispers through the air, accompanied by the lingering scents of wet pavement and sea salt. The clouds form a gray overhead tapestry, with the occasional hint of brightness struggling to break through. The chill of the morning, with temperatures hovering around the low forties, nudges one to bundle up. A light westerly wind adds an invigorating chill, making it clear that layers will be your faithful companions today.

The day promises to shift as the sun glimmers shyly behind the clouds. By afternoon, the forecast hints at a transition, with periods of sunlight making an entrance, albeit at a cool high of 55 degrees. While they say there’s a chance of additional drizzle before that golden warmth unveils itself, one can expect the sky to lend itself to an intriguing mixture of sun and clouds. It would be wise to dress in layers — perhaps a light jacket over a cozy sweater — to ensure comfort as you navigate the day’s variations. Given the cool breeze and the whimsical weather, a visit to a hidden café, or perhaps a stroll along one of the city’s vibrant streets, would nicely complement the mood. Take a moment to savor the unique blend of urban life amidst the unfolding coastal serenity.
